name: Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Handy v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Mr. Derrald Handy, Pro Se, appellant.
Chad L. Allensworth, Esq., PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
73 A.3d 575
Derrald HANDY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

Aug. 20, 2013.
Mr. Derrald Handy, Pro Se, appellant.
Chad L. Allensworth, Esq., PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
